metadata.title: CVE-2023-21889 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox product of Oracle Virtualization(component: Core). Supported versions that are affected are Prior to 6.1.42and prior to 7.0.6. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privilegedattacker with logon to the infrastructure where Oracle VM VirtualBoxexecutes to compromise Oracle VM VirtualBox. While the vulnerability is inOracle VM VirtualBox, attacks may significantly impact additional products(scope change). Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result inunauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle VM VirtualBox accessibledata. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 3.8 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:L/I:N/A:N).

criterions.comment: virtualbox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
